directions: Heat frozen peas in a small microwave-safe bowl on high in the microwave until hot, about 3 minutes.
Stir Italian cheese blend, nutritional yeast, and garlic powder into peas; season with salt and black pepper.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon shredded Italian cheese blend (such as Wegmans®)
1 teaspoon nutritional yeast, or more to taste
1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Lazy Green Peas
